programme.title: Top Star - EP 8

programme.title: Dunia Tipu Tipu, Ujungnya Tetep I Lop U
programme.desc: The story tells of Acha and Daffa's pre-wedding event suddenly failed because Daffa already had another girlfriend. Then, at the suggestion of her sister, Acha finally went ahead with the pre-wedding event with another man named Mamat. Mamat was given a makeover, like a foreigner who had just arrived in Indonesia. Although it was all a ruse, it managed to annoy Daffa. So, will Mamat's disguise be exposed?

Ojan's debt was because Nadia asked him to fix her motorbike which suddenly broke down. From Nadia's conversation with her father, it turns out that Ojan also just found out that the girlfriend Ojan wanted to meet was cheating on him with Nadia's boyfriend.

programme.title: KAPAN NIKAH? VS DOAIN AJA
programme.desc: Jana (Glenca Chysara) and Jeni (Ina Marika) are two sisters with different personalities. Jana is a tomboy and works as a car mechanic. Meanwhile, Jeni is a girl who likes to dress up, hang out, and is feminine. The two swap bodies after being electrocuted. Meanwhile, Rafi (Fendy Chow) is Jeni's boyfriend. There is turmoil of love and feelings between the two sisters.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 39
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: POV Punya Pacar Semanis Kamu
programme.desc: Alexa (Larasati Nugroho) is still in a relationship with her fiancé. However, it turns out he's having an affair behind her back. Strangely, Alexa ends up having a relationship with her driver, Bram (Lavicky Nicholas). So what will happen to Alexa's love life, given that her relationships are often frowned upon?

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 493
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 19
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KALO JULEHA MENDADAK TAJIR
programme.desc: Juleha (Angelica Simperler) works as a security guard with Joni (Cakrawala Airawan) at Diana's office. One night, a motorcycle follows Diana home from work. Juleha becomes suspicious and it turns out that the pickpocket is indeed targeting Diana. Finally, Juleha helps Diana from the pickpocket. With gratitude, Diana appoints Juleha as a personal assistant to Chelsea (Debi Sagita), Diana's daughter. Juleha also gets an official residence and a private car while working as a personal assistant.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 39
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Cuma Pura Pura Mencintaimu, Bercyndyaaa!
programme.desc: Aldo (Kiki Farrel) has to find a new boarding house after being kicked out by the boarding house owner, the father of Riska (Angie Ang), his ex. However, suddenly Dila (Jennifer Eve), Riska's sister, claims Aldo is her boyfriend. Finally, in order to stay in the boarding house, Aldo has to pretend to be dating Dila.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 493
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: JODOHKU DI BENGKEL MOTOR
programme.desc: Dea is a girl whose hobby is riding a dirt bike. Because of her reckless driving on the road, Dea hit another motorcyclist named Gilang. Gilang was angry with Dea because of her arrogant nature. Gilang finally confiscated Dea's motorbike key. If Dea wanted her motorbike key back, Gilang told her to get it at the motorbike repair shop where Gilang worked.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 20
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Aku Butuh Ayang Walau Tuhan Maha Penyayang
programme.desc: Naya takes care of a man named Leo (Rizky Fachrel) who can't walk due to an accident during illegal motorcycle racing. Leo's mother said that Leo is an introverted child and has no friends. She asked Naya to be comfortable taking care of Leo. Naya told Leo's mother that she would take care of and help Leo until Leo could recover. Naya diligently takes care of Leo, helping him during physiotherapy. Unexpectedly, Leo likes Naya.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 40
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Senyum Neng Yang Bikin Gula Cepet Abis
programme.desc: It is said that Fahri (Erdin Werdrayana) has just returned from traveling to the city. He wants to meet his girlfriend Tiara in the village. However, it turns out that Tiara is engaged to a handsome, rich man, and the girl even said that her future husband will soon become the village head. Then from there, Fahri, who feels hurt and resentful because he has been betrayed, becomes obsessed with becoming the village head. Fahri asks for help from a beautiful girl who owns a grocery store.

Fahri asks for help from a beautiful girl who owns a grocery store.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 494
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 20
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KAPAN NIKAH? VS DOAIN AJA
programme.desc: Jana (Glenca Chysara) and Jeni (Ina Marika) are two sisters with different personalities. Jana is a tomboy and works as a car mechanic. Meanwhile, Jeni is a girl who likes to dress up, hang out, and is feminine. The two swap bodies after being electrocuted. Meanwhile, Rafi (Fendy Chow) is Jeni's boyfriend. There is turmoil of love and feelings between the two sisters.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 40
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: POV Punya Pacar Semanis Kamu
programme.desc: Alexa (Larasati Nugroho) is still in a relationship with her fiancé. However, it turns out he's having an affair behind her back. Strangely, Alexa ends up having a relationship with her driver, Bram (Lavicky Nicholas). So what will happen to Alexa's love life, given that her relationships are often frowned upon?

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 494
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KALO JULEHA MENDADAK TAJIR
programme.desc: Juleha (Angelica Simperler) works as a security guard with Joni (Cakrawala Airawan) at Diana's office. One night, a motorcycle follows Diana home from work. Juleha becomes suspicious and it turns out that the pickpocket is indeed targeting Diana. Finally, Juleha helps Diana from the pickpocket. With gratitude, Diana appoints Juleha as a personal assistant to Chelsea (Debi Sagita), Diana's daughter. Juleha also gets an official residence and a private car while working as a personal assistant.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 21
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Jadi Bos Jangan Galak Galak, Gak Bahaya Ta?
programme.desc: A police officer named Ferdi (Andrew Andika) who was driving his car, was suddenly almost hit by a motorbike driven by a reckless woman named Mirna (Anjani Dina). Finally the police officer reprimanded him, Mirna said that she was in a hurry. One day they met again at Ferdi's house. Long story short, Ferdi already had a girlfriend, but her girlfriend turned out to be fierce to Ferdi's son, Rafa, even to the point of slapping him. Finally, Mirna helped Rafa and was loved by him.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 41
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Visi Misi Cinta Pagar Bagus
programme.desc: Galih (Cemal Faruk), a photographer, immediately falls in love with make-up artist Audi (Yiriska Patricia). Galih immediately sets out on a mission to win Audi's heart.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 495
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Klik Riders - EP 20
programme.desc: Sebuah program untun tontonan semua.

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara yang dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal menjemput artis menaiki kereta 'Vintage' dan berbual menceritakan tentang kisah hidup mereka.

programme.title: Opah Popular - EP 10
programme.desc: Badrul dan Sofia bertugas di luar negara dan menghabiskan cuti dengan balik ke kampung. Anaknya mereka dipaksa untuk tinggal bersama opah.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 20
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series - EP 15
programme.desc: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series kisah tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Jep & Judin - EP 12
programme.desc: Jep dan Judin adik-beradik tiri yang lurus bendul meminati sukan bermotor. Jep mahu jadi Johan Rempit dan Judin mahu menolongnya mencapai mimpi itu.

programme.title: Lawak Sorang - Sorang - EP 7
programme.desc: Bocey & Friends, rancangan sitcom yang di bintangi oleh Achey, Fad, Abam, Zulin dan artis jemputan.

programme.title: Hairul Hanis Junior - EP 8
programme.desc: Ikuti perjalanan Hanis Zalikha dan Hairul Azreen berkongsi detik manis menyambut kelahiran anak pertama mereka, Yusuf Iskandar.

programme.title: Destinasi Ke Destinasi - EP 5
programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis - EP 5
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Fitness Battle - EP 1
programme.desc: Artis-artis tempatan akan bertarung dalam beberapa cabaran kecergasan yang akan menguji daya mental dan fizikal mereka.

programme.title: Muka Buku - EP 5
programme.desc: Muka Buku ialah rancangan permainan meneka, di mana selebriti perlu meneka antara empat peserta, siapa yang palsu dan siapa Muka Buku Sebenar

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2022 - EP 10
programme.desc: Sepahtu kembali menghiburkan anda sekeluarga.

programme.title: Di Balik Tawa - EP 3
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara menggunakan konsep terbuka atau sesi perkongsian daripada pelawak-pelawak yang akan menceritakan pengalaman dan kisah yang mereka tidak pernah kongsi dengan masyarakat.

programme.title: Yem Rempit - EP 5
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom mengisahkan kehidupan Yem membahagikan masa antara isteri, mertua, kerjaya dan juga rakan-rakan. Semuanya dilakonkan di restoran bapa mertuanya.

programme.title: Kampung Boy S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Nostalgia kehidupan di kampung dirakamkan dalam siri animasi Kampung Boy dengan pelbagai watak yang menarik disulami dengan pelbagai peristiwa lucu dan menghiburkan.

programme.title: Kiah The Spy - EP 1
programme.desc: Kiah membina kumpulan baru untuk menguruskan perniagaan Ikan Pekasamnya,dia juga dilatih dan dilantik menjadi seorang ejen rahsia.

programme.title: Awak Suka Saya Tak? - EP 1
programme.desc: Intan mencintai Hilman Yong, Sejak kemalangan berlaku Hilman hilang menjadi Damien Yong. Kini Intan terpaksa menyayangi bekas suaminya dari jauh dan menunggu Hilman kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: My Little Heroes - Yusuf & Bujibu - EP 7
programme.desc: Kenali dunia Yusuf dan Bujibu sebagai adik beradik serta bagaimana Hairul & Hanis apabila bersama kedua ‘anak’ mereka dalam menjalani aktiviti harian.

programme.title: Berita Hangit - EP 1
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa komedi yang dilakonkan oleh pelawak -pelawak dan pelakon terbaik Malaysia seperti Zizan , Afdlin , Khir Rahman , Marsha . Jangan lupa saksikan komedi ini yang sesuai ditonton bersama keluarga , Pastinya gelak di Astro Warna

programme.desc: Himpunan petikan terbaik dari semua rancangan di Astro Warna dan segmen alih bahasa dari petikan telenovela yang di alih bahasa oleh pelakon komedi tempatan

programme.title: 10 Tips Tipu Bini
programme.desc: Apabila 3 pengarah kreatif di syarikat pengiklanan cuba memikat 3 gadis intern yang bekerja di syarikat mereka untuk dijadikan kekasih, mereka terpaksa menipu isteri mereka untuk melaksanakan niat mereka.

programme.title: Generasi Gamerz - EP 4
programme.desc: Dua selebriti "Gamerz" akan bekerjasama dengan ibu atau bapa mereka untuk bertanding di dalam cabaran permainan video popular seperti Mobile Legends, FIFA20 & banyak lagi!

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat - EP 6
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal, rancangan latah paling kecoh kini kembali dengan musim terbaru. Saksikan kaki latah popular seperti PS Mansur, Eida Moin & Nazia Mustafar menggeletek anda seisi keluarga.

programme.title: Tai Tai Berkecai - EP 3
programme.desc: Azlan Martins dikenali sebagai lelaki yang paling dihormati di negara ini. The Martins Ladies, isterinya, dan dua anak perempuan terkenal dengan gaya hidup mewah mereka.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 55
programme.desc: Eyra beritahu Zayn yang Adellia telah mengupah orang untuk menculiknya. Adellia gembira melihat Dr Farhan semakin mesra dengan Adrian. Aziz mulai sangsi dengan perilaku Maria.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 12
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak - EP 9
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: Tolonglah, Cik B! - EP 8
programme.desc: Cik B diberi ‘lesen’ untuk meninggalkan rumahnya bersama seorang rakan hos, dan mereka bersama akan meneroka aktiviti hobi & sukan baru dan menarik sambil kita mengenali Cik B dengan lebih mendalam.

programme.title: Pengantin Lelaki Untuk Cik Gadis - EP 14
programme.desc: Kecewa dengan impian untuk bergelar tentera, Kris al-Hadi ke ladang Tok Abah. Pertemuan dengan Salsabila, gadis malang yang difitnah hingga terpenjara telah menimbulkan rasa simpati dan cinta.

programme.title: Sesat - EP 5
programme.desc: Sesat, rancangan yang menguji minda dan ikhtiar hidup selebriti tempatan dalam mencari destinasi yang ditetapkan.

programme.title: Kampung Pom Pom Letops - EP 10
programme.desc: Elly Mazlein atau dikenali sebagai Kak Lina Pom Pom menjemput tetamu jemputan yang terdiri daripada duda dan jejaka idaman Malaya.

programme.title: Roti Cicah Susu - EP 12
programme.desc: Empat orang anak yatim terpisah. Selepas 15 tahun, mereka bertemu semula dan cuba untuk mencari jawapan tentang apa yang berlaku sehingga membuka banyak rahsia yang tak sepatutnya diketahui.

programme.title: Lara Oh Lara! - EP 9
programme.desc: Lara Oh Lara membawakan kepada anda aksi lucu dan comel Lara Alana dalam kehidupan sehariannya. Dipenuhi gelak tawa dan kecomelan anak kepada pasangan Awal Asha'ari dan Scha Al-Yahya khas untuk anda

programme.title: Perang Periuk - EP 9
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang unik di mana ibu mentua akan bertarung dengan menantu perempuan untuk memenangi hati juri-juri dan orang yang tersayang dengan masakan mereka.

programme.title: Yuna Bintang Di Langit - EP 2
programme.desc: Ikuti Yuna meneruskan kerjayanya dalam bidang muzik di sekeliling Malaysia, Los Angeles & San Diego dengan kandungan eksklusif

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 1
programme.desc: Sepanjang hidupnya, Khalil sakit akibat ubat yang diberi oleh ibunya, Erma sehingga menyebabkan dia selalu pengsan. Syafiq pula terpaksa keluar bekerja mencari nafkah untuk keluarganya.

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 2
programme.desc: Esra baling telefon ke muka Alyah sehingga kepalanya berdarah. Khalil menjalani rawatan chemo di rumah bersama Erma. Dr Nini mula mencurigai Erma.

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 3
programme.desc: Erma ditemuramah oleh seorang wartawan tentang status kewangannya. Sementara itu, Syafiq terpaksa bekerja lebih masa untuk membeli keperluan adik-adiknya. Esra pula mengugut untuk membunuh Alyah.

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 4
programme.desc: Esra membuat laporan polis ke atas pertuduhan terhadap Eddie. Sementara itu, Khalil menyedari dia tidak mengalami kesan sampingan dari chemo seperti kanak-kanak kanser yang lain.

programme.title: Carta 10 - EP 9
programme.desc: Hidup Ria yang mewah berubah sekelip mata. Demi mendapatkan harta, Ria bersubahat dengan seorang lelaki Cina iaitu Sean. Berjayakah Sean menolong Ria?

programme.title: Mat Dan Kaki Jalan - EP 10

programme.desc: Unhappiness, loneliness, anxiety, depression, harassment... The 2018 world champions talk to young citizens and discuss mental health issues without taboos. programme.title: Recolter L'hiver
programme.desc: Producing vegetables without heating while it's snowing is the challenge taken up by Jean-Marie Fortier, the market gardeners of Ferme des Quatre-Temps, Jardin des Funambules and Ferme Chapeau Melon. An immersion into the daily life of pioneers who manage to harvest fresh vegetables in the heart of the Quebec winter.

programme.desc: Italy, a country that surprises with its economic rebound: its GDP per capita now matches that of France, and its exports are doing well. Could we draw inspiration from Italy's economic strategies? And what are their limitations?

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Boss - EP 2
programme.desc: The very first pan-African audiovisual competition for entrepreneurs. For eight weeks, sixteen candidates from all over Africa will be accompanied by four exceptional mentors as they develop their project: Claude Borna, A'Salfo, Nicole Sulu and Yassine Laghzioui. A number of celebrities will also come to talk about their experiences, including champion Teddy Riner.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 11
programme.desc: A picture postcard of the Gascony countryside, the Gers, with its vineyards and verdant landscapes, is a ''big garden'', rich in agriculture and livestock. The birthplace of d'Artagnan and Armagnac, Gascon traditions and cuisine live on in this land of history and culture.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone - EP 10
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 5
programme.desc: Delpierre and Villeneuve prepare to defend the anti-Lymitrol amendment with a radio interview. Bowman decides to leak the link between the MP's wife and the Paoletti Foundation. Chloe discovers that her father had made one last phone call before dying.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 6
programme.desc: Chloe is convinced that Percy is involved in her father's death. He then tries to ensure she poses a threat. Saskia's intimidation attempt leads Sorensen to contact Claire. She manages to get him to reveal the name of the laboratory that tested Edenx, thus relaunching her investigation.

programme.title: E-Rallye Monte-Carlo 2025
programme.desc: It has become one of the benchmark events in the Bridgestone FIA ecoRally Cup. A look back at the 2025 edition of the E-Rallye Monte-Carlo (15-18 October), a road race reserved for 100% electric vehicles, without the use of a range extender.

programme.title: La Reine Soleil
programme.desc: Ancient Egypt, 18th dynasty. The fiery Princess Akhesa, 14, rebels against her father, Pharaoh Akhenaten. She refuses to live confined within the walls of the royal palace and runs away with the help of Prince Tut to find her mother, Queen Nefertiti, who has been exiled on Elephantine Island...

programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 12 DEC (Live)
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. We connect with fans from around the world as they share their views on their teams and favourite players.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 12 DEC
programme.desc: We preview the first Wear-Tyne derby in almost a decade as Sunderland host Newcastle, plus we discuss Arsenal v Wolves with Emmanuel Petit and we focus on Manchester United v Bournemouth.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND - FRI 12 DEC
programme.desc: WTTW is on the road in Sunderland as Ayo is joined by club legend John O'Shea to get a tour of the city ahead of the first Premier League Wear-Tyne derby in 10 years, while Phil Foden faces challenges on the dartboard from Ellie Collins as the PDC World Darts Championship get underway.

programme.title: TEAM TALKS - FRI 12 DEC (Live)
programme.desc: Punditry, pressers and predictions ahead of the PL weekend. Our studio team tackle all the major talking points and we hear from the headline acts as the players and the managers have their say ahead of the action.

programme.title: FANTASY SHOW - FRI 12 DEC
programme.desc: Haaland or Salah? Saka or Palmer? Isak or Cunha? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy, but the Fantasy Show is on hand to help FPL Managers with those big decisions.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 12 DEC
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. We connect with fans from around the world as they share their views on their teams and favourite players.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 12 DEC

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND - FRI 12 DEC

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 28
programme.desc: We join Regis Le Bris as he charts his meteoric journey from the training pitches of France to the dugout at Sunderland, where he masterminded an unlikely charge to the Premier League. Le Bris reflects on the philosophy and resilience that helped his side punch far above their weight. We also travel back to France to uncover the formative experiences and influences that shaped one of football's most intriguing modern managers.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 9
programme.desc: Kevin Phillips remembers the unforgettable 1999/00 season, when he took the Premier League by storm with 30 goals for Sunderland - a tally that made him the top scorer in European football that campaign.

programme.title: TEAM TALKS - FRI 12 DEC

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: PREMIER LEAGUE LIVE (Live)
programme.desc: Live match action from the latest match round of the Premier League, with insight, analysis, and reaction from our expert panel of studio guests.

programme.title: Sunderland v Newcastle United (MW16) (Goal Rush) (Live)
programme.desc: Live match action from the latest match round of the Premier League, with insight, analysis, and reaction from our expert panel of studio guests.

programme.title: Netbusters 2025/26 - EP 15
programme.desc: Relive the best action from the Premier League with this fast-paced ISO angle highlights show, featuring every game and every goal from each matchround.

programme.title: PL Preview 2025/26 - EP 15
programme.desc: We preview the first Wear-Tyne derby in almost a decade as Sunderland host Newcastle, plus we discuss Arsenal v Wolves with Emmanuel Petit and we focus on Manchester United v Bournemouth.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Manchester United (MW15) - EP 150
programme.desc: Wolves did the Premier League double over Manchester United last season, as many victories as they’d managed in their previous 14 against the Red Devils (W2 D3 L9).

programme.title: PL Rivalries 2025/26 - EP 1
programme.desc: Rivalries don’t get much bigger than Sunderland v Newcastle. With the Wear-Tyne derby around the corner, Sunderland legend Kevin Phillips and former Newcastle goalkeeper Shay Given sit down to discuss why this game matters so much and to talk through their top ten moments from the derby over the years.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2025/26 - EP 9
programme.desc: Kevin Phillips remembers the unforgettable 1999/00 season, when he took the Premier League by storm with 30 goals for Sunderland - a tally that made him the top scorer in European football that campaign.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 28
programme.desc: We join Regis Le Bris as he charts his meteoric journey from the training pitches of France to the dugout at Sunderland, where he masterminded an unlikely charge to the Premier League. Le Bris reflects on the philosophy and resilience that helped his side punch far above their weight. We also travel back to France to uncover the formative experiences and influences that shaped one of football’s most intriguing modern managers.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: Fantasy Show 2025/26 - EP 16
programme.desc: Haaland or Salah? Saka or Palmer? Isak or Cunha? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy, but the Fantasy Show is on hand to help FPL Managers with those big decisions.

programme.desc: We preview the first Wear-Tyne derby in almost a decade as Sunderland host Newcastle, plus we discuss Arsenal v Wolves with Emmanuel Petit and we focus on Manchester United v Bournemouth.

programme.desc: Liverpool have just 23 points (W7 D2 L6) and have conceded 24 goals in the Premier League this season, the worst start by a reigning champion in both metrics after 15 games since Leicester in 2016-17 (16 points, 26 conceded).

programme.title: FS MMA Fedor Emelianenko vs. Eric Pele
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! MMA legend Fedor Emelianenko is slated to fight Eric Pele in St. Petersburg, Russian. This fight does not go past the first round and ends in a flurry of punches for one fighter.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Luis Collazo for the interim WBC welterweight championship. Collazo injures his hand early on, but has to keep pushing forward.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Shodai, Kagayaki, Mitakeumi and Tochiozan from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 9: Netanya, Israel - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Krav Maga with Masters Ran Nakash and Avivit Oftek Cohen.

But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 23

After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 5

To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: CNBC Explains - EP 4
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: CNBC On Assignment
programme.desc: CNBC goes on assignment at the biggest events around the world, bringing you interviews and insight from the most influential leaders in business, politics, activism and the arts.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime rpt - EP 50
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money (rpt) - EP 98
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Channel Japan - EP 32
programme.desc: Channel Japan offers a fresh look at the latest in the economy, business, technology, culture and sightseeing of Japan.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record
programme.desc: CNBC Sport: On The Record explores the convergence of sports, business, and investing. Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich.

programme.title: CNBC Sports - PGA TOUR
programme.desc: Highlights from the latest PGA TOUR tournament.

programme.title: CNBC Sports - UIM MotoSurf World Championship
programme.desc: MotoSurf racing was established in the Czech Republic back in 2012. In its quite short history, the MotoSurf racing has spread all over the world. Since 2019, the sport has been officially recognized by the UIM (Union International Motonautique) - recognized by IOC (International Olympic Committee) since 2010.

programme.title: CNBC Sports - UIM MotoSurf World Championship
programme.desc: MotoSurf racing was established in the Czech Republic back in 2012. In its quite short history, the MotoSurf racing has spread all over the world. Since 2019, the sport has been officially recognized by the UIM (Union International Motonautique) - recognized by IOC (International Olympic Committee) since 2010.

programme.title: Cape To Cape 2025
programme.desc: Welcome to the home of Cape to Cape, Australia’s largest and most popular four day MTB stage race. Based in Margaret River Western Australia, this iconic riding experience includes access to stunning private trails, vineyard visits, brewery finishes and some of the warmest hospitality the region has to offer.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers - EP 1740
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers - EP 1741
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: CNBC Meets
programme.desc: CNBC’s Tania Bryer gets 'up close and personal' with some of the world's most famous faces from the world of business, politics, sport, and the arts. They all have two things in common; they are all internationally renowned and they are all major philanthropists.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: CNBC’s longest running feature show. For over 20 years Christine Tan has been talking to people who are shaping, governing and leading the Asia-Pacific region in this multi-award award winning show.

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 7
programme.desc: ‘Executive Decisions’ is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. Hosted by Steve Sedgwick, each episode explores the pivotal choices that shape the careers and legacies of business leaders and policymakers. Through candid conversations about risk, doubt and conviction, the series reminds us that even the most powerful face uncertainty and trade-offs.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record

programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Samurai Drama Selections "Kumokiri Nizaemon Final" Eps. 8 (Final) (R)
programme.desc: Kumokiri Nizaemon, a thief-of-all-time and the leader of a gang of thieves. Without resorting to violence and leaving no trace behind, he brilliantly steals enormous sum of money from the wealthy. In this final chapter of the series, Nizaemon sets his sights on the hidden vault of Edo’s most powerful moneylender-and the legendary sword "Juzumaru Tsunetsugu".

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Eps. 55 (R)
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: Natsui Itsuki's Haiku Trip! "Hiroshima" Part 2
programme.desc: Haiku poet Natsui Itsuki sets "Haiku Post" across Japan, and receives "your piece of Haiku"! She selects unique works from among them, and invites the authors of those haiku to share their intentions, memories, and life stories. ROLAND, the King of the Hosts, accompanies her as a partner on the trip.

programme.title: French in a Happy Mood
programme.desc: Let’s learn simple and easy-to-remember phrases, looking at a modern Europe that cherishes its history and traditions while pursuing a lifestyle that fits its stature. Furthermore, we explore tips for "happiness" and various forms of "joy" through the unique European way of thinking and values behind their languages and lifestyles.

programme.title: Delicious Japan! (R)
programme.desc: Japan boasts a wide variety of fresh produce and quality food. Find out how and where it's all made. Plus: master chefs reveal their special recipes!

At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 47 (R)
programme.desc: Hitotsubashi Harusada’s poisoned manju corners Sadanobu and his men. But Tsutaju unveils an unexpected strategy that reignites a vendetta, involving Shogun Ienari in the plot.

programme.title: Special Drama "Mary of Magdalene Restaurant" Part 2
programme.desc: Oikawa Shimon, a chef who has lost everything, drifts into Tsukihate, an imaginary town where those on the brink of life mysteriously gather. There he finds Magdala-ya, a tiny diner on a cliff run by Ria Arima-a mysterious woman with a scar on the neck. Through Ria’s cooking and her unconditional kindness, Shimon begins to reclaim the courage to live. Based on Harada Maha’s novel, this moving drama explores sin, redemption, and the irreplaceable value of life.

programme.title: Outside in Lost in Academia "Shopping Street" (R)
programme.desc: Japanese culture is in the global spotlight like never before. Dive into the work of international scholars exploring Japan in bold, original ways, uncovering unique perspectives and deep insights.

programme.title: Solo Trip to Hot Springs "Hokuriku & Shinetsu"
programme.desc: Even if you were able to travel, it would often be a rushed trip with limited time... For you, this program is like a solo trip to hot spring resorts, allowing you to fully relax and experience the best of destinations!

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Let's learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: Tokoro-san's Pursuit of Truth
programme.desc: An informational program that reveals Japan as it is by following incidents posted on local media such as local newspapers and business presses.

programme.title: Fun with Japanese (R)
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a word as a theme, exploring its meaning and history while discovering the charm of Japanese language. The program also features dance performances of quotes from the world’s great figures, visits schools to interact with children, and introduces classical performing arts and songs, making it enjoyable for both children and adults.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy English and Meets the World (R)
programme.desc: Children search for wonders worldwide and challenge themselves to communicate with foreigners in English through puppet shows, games, animation, and more. Have fun and learn English naturally with a witch, Kyary Pamyu Pamyu!

programme.title: Strolling with Tamori
programme.desc: Comedian Tamori takes you on a tour across the country to offer a glimpse of history hidden in modern scenes.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings "Underwear Revolution"
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Drama for the 100th Anniversary of Broadcasting "Queen of Mars" Eps. 1 (New)
programme.desc: An original sci-fi drama based on Ogawa Satoshi’s novel, scripted by Yoshida Reiko. In 2125, Mars hosts 100,000 settlers under ISDA’s control, as tension brews between authority and freedom. Lili-E1102 (Suri Lin), a visually impaired woman born on Mars, endures harsh training to reach Earth-for one reason: to meet Shiraishi Aoto (Suda Masaki), a young ISDA officer, and honor a secret promise.

programme.title: Samurai Drama Selections "The Way of Commerce: Gold and Silver 2" Eps. 1 (New)
programme.desc: The essence of trade lies in "joy for the buyer, happiness for the seller." Season 2 follows Sachi (Koshiba Fuka), who, after overcoming hardships and marrying the 6th heir Tomozo (Matsumoto Leo), faces new trials. As Isuzuya grows, she endures loss, defies convention to become its seventh female head, and boldly opens an Edo branch. With inventive ideas and strong bonds, she builds its foundation- a vibrant tale steeped in Japan’s kimono culture, a heritage now captivating the world.

programme.title: Premium Drama "End-of-life Planning Shared House" Eps. 7 (R)
programme.desc: In a shared house on the outskirts of Tokyo, three lifelong friends live together, led by culinary expert Utako (Takeshita Keiko). One day, university student Hayami Shota (Jo Kairi) is invited to be Utako's secretary, sparking a lively exchange between generations. Later, their old friend Tsuneko (Ichige Yoshie), who shows signs of Mild Cognitive Impairment, joins them, throwing things into a bit of chaos. They also begin to confront the real-life challenges of senior living.

programme.title: The Visualization Entertainment: Go! Kaneo-kun
programme.desc: The show is MC-ed by comedian Ariyoshi Hiroiki, who hosts an NHK program on a regular basis for the first time. The mascot character "Kaneo-kun" (voice of Nobu, of comedy duo Chidori), who loves money, visits various places, including popular visiting locations, and looks into different phenomena to learn how money plays a role. The undertaking help unravel unexpected trends in society. The program, which can be enjoyed by every member of the family, offers much food for thought.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 48 (Final)
programme.desc: After reopening his bookshop, Tsutaju continues to publish Sharaku’s prints and later expands into the field of Japanese classical studies, working energetically as a bookseller. However, one day, Tsutaju collapses from beriberi. While Tei and Utamaro worry about him, he pushes through his illness to create works together with his companions-Masanobu, Shigemasa, Nanpo, and Kisanji-cultivating the world through the written word. Then, one night, Tsutaju has a mysterious dream.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 6
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 & What's On Today - EP 23
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2701
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 17
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: Tastebuds Pamper Top 100 Delicacy Restro
programme.desc: The show takes you to visit restaurants and shops that may not be mentioned in travel guides or are not particularly noticeable. In addition to discovering hidden gems, our food experts will also share their personal tips for enjoying the dishes.

programme.desc: A low-key wealthy man leaves seven last wishes for his seven daughters, born from different mothers. The seven sisters, who are more like strangers, embark on a journey to search for family as their father's last wish, while also finding their own self-worth.

programme.title: Cantopop At 50

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: The story tells of Wei Xiaobao's journey to serve in the Qing court, where he is assigned by Eunuch Hai to spy on the Empress Dowager's activities. Xiaobao uses his wit to eventually force the fake Empress Dowager to leave and bring the treacherous Ao Bai to justice.

programme.title: JSG Billboard 2025
programme.desc: Count down to the top 20 songs on JSG Billboard every episode!

programme.title: Finance Magazine 2025
programme.desc: Finance Magazine closely follows the market, Hong Kong stocks trends and the property market situation. Through interviews with industry insiders and market analysis, it explores the hot topics in Hong Kong and international finance.

programme.title: Gourmet Express

programme.title: News At 18:30

programme.title: Sunday Report 2025

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 4
programme.desc: Someone assaults Ching-tin. Fortunately, Man-sum turns up and intervenes just in time. Actually, that person is Lai Chau, the father of a gifted child called Lai Ka-ming, who was interviewed many years ago. Lai Chau alleges a news story written by Ching-tin caused his family to break up. Ching-tin feels she has wronged Lai Chau as she reviews the old story, so she wants to make it up to him by helping him locate missing Ka-ming.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 20
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 9
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 5
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 6
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 18
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 19
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 14
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 7
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 23
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 24
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 14
